ImageFunction

　The ImageFunction class is a class for manipulating images.
　Objects cannot be created from this class.

Members

Constructor
None
Methods
adjustGamma ( Gamma correction )
colorRect ( Rectangular semi-transparent fill )
doBoxBlur ( Apply box blur )
doGrayScale ( Grayscale conversion )
drawGlyph ( Glyph rendering )
drawText ( Text rendering )
fillRect ( Rectangular fill )
flipLR ( Flip horizontal )
flipUD ( Flip vertical )
operateAffine ( Affine transformation composite )
operateRect ( Rectangular composite )
operateStretch ( Stretched composite )
Properties
None
Events
None
